message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was really hoping to get closer to the price I was thinking of. How about $90?
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about $125?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit far from my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $100?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get at least $128 for the product. How about $128?
I'm afraid I'm not willing to go any higher than $100. If you're not willing to sell it to me for that price, I'll have to consider buying it from someone else.
